comment: This professor was great throughout the year. Gave plenty of extra credit which was great if you do bad on the tests.  Quizzes are done in class but he usually announces them the class before so you could prepare yourself. Test are open note and practices similar test the class before. Overall, you just have to put in the work like any other class.

Meh...this guy was ok. Honestly, I learned more from the book and have been inspired more by non-accounting teachers than this guy. He's nice but ineffective as a teacher in my opinion. He gives out points like candy on Halloween, which is great if you want an easy A. If he reads this, I think he should change his approach to teaching the class.

Guys, please, I thought to myself it won't be that bad. I was wrong. It was horrible. it was 3 hours of my life sucked out of me every week sometimes more. The tests are taken through a app called proctor where someone stares at you 1 on 1 with 2 cameras. I never thought a professor would care that much without teaching ONCE. DO NOT TAKE!
